channel.title: Uploading Problems [Help]
channel.description:
Ok so i have 1 folder with the server source and one folder with server client and both have a bunch of files all in them
i wanna upload to a site such as www.uppit.com
do i upload client or source?
and there both not uploading that 1 folder full of files like i have to put each file in there i cant just put the client folder or source folder in there?
SO QUESTIONS ARE:
DO I upload client or source folder?
Why doesnt it upload the folder instead of opening it and only letting me select the single files in the folders....
HELP PLEASE!

item.title: Uploading Problems [Help]
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

Add to a archive to upload to a uploading site.

Read full topic

item.title: Uploading Problems [Help]
item.dc:creator: @needsalife needsalife
item.description:
@needsalife wrote:

Right click, select archive. Once that’s done, you can upload the archived source/client onto uppit or where ever.

Read full topic

item.title: Uploading Problems [Help]
item.dc:creator: @Never_Again Never Again
item.description:
@Never_Again wrote:

how do you add it into an archive right click it?

and do I upload my source folder or just client?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 06, 2009, 05:34:15 pm[/size][hr]???[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 06, 2009, 05:36:39 pm[/size][hr]help please

Read full topic

item.title: Uploading Problems [Help]
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You add your file you want to upload into an Archive, using WinRar, then you upload it.

Read full topic
